Summary: laying down looked up saw dozens of lights that looked like stars flashing and moving
trends: There have been 73 other sightings in Salt Lake City
There were no other sightings in Salt Lake City on or around April 30th 2005
divs: sighting detailsi am in telepathic contact with intelligent life, and i have seen several ufos. on this occasion, i happened to be lying down in salt lake city, near the greyhound bus station waiting for a bus, when i looked up and saw a swirling mass of lights moving around and blinking on and off. they looked a lot like stars, but brighter. i was telepathed that it was a celebration for my having contacted the cia about my contact and sending emails to governments explaining much of the alien agendas. please see the mufon webboards under "the black triangles", subheading under "ufo crafts\ships", subheading under "ufo talk", for more details, including a few emails the aliens had me send out. by the way, i am completely sane and this is not a hoax. i truly have been in telepathic contact with extraterrestrials since around 1996.
